title: why did i get permanent suspended i only play bots
body: Riot my account lentrell got peppermint banned i don,t know why tho i only play bots and i don,t feed i also don,t trash talk i never even got a 14 day suspension,or warning can you please review my account as soon as possible.

replies.body: No worries just yet! I looked over your account and it seems like there was some weird activity taking place. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can go over what was happening and get you back on the Rift!
